LanguageData.ARL_AssaultCarbine.label: assault carbine
LanguageData.ARL_AssaultCarbine.description: Full auto and high accuracy make this weapon desirable in the Rimworlds, however low damage and armor penetration makes it often unreliable against armored enemies.
LanguageData.ARL_AssaultCarbine.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.ARL_AssaultCarbine.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.ARL_BattleRifle.label: battle rifle
LanguageData.ARL_BattleRifle.description: The factory issue Hemlok fires a two-round burst. While this can be a liability at short range, this tradeoff allowed the glitterworld engineers to deliver a weapon with a good balance of long-range accuracy, damage, and fire rate.
LanguageData.ARL_BattleRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.ARL_BattleRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.ARL_BattleRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: battle rifle
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_AssaultCarbine.label: assault carbine bullet
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_BattleRifle.label: battle rifle bullet
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_BullpupRifle.label: bullpup rifle bullet
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_ChargeLMG.label: charge shot
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_ChargeMinigun.label: charge shot
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_ChargePistol.label: charge shot
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_ChargeShotgun.label: charge shot
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_ChargeSMG.label: charge shot
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_ChargeSniperRifle.label: charge shot
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_CombatHandgun.label: combat handgun bullet
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_CompactSMG.label: compact SMG bullet
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_GrenadeLauncher.label: frag grenade
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_HandCannon.label: hand cannon bullet
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_HMG.label: HMG bullet
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_LeverActionShotgun.label: shotgun blast
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_LightSMG.label: light SMG bullet
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_MarksmanRifle.label: marksman rifle bullet
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_MechanoidLMG.label: mechanoid LMG bullet
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_MechanoidRifle.label: charge shot
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_MechanoidRocketLauncher.label: mini-inferno shell
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_MechanoidSniperRifle.label: charge shot
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_SemiautomaticRifle.label: semi-automatic rifle bullet
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_SemiAutomaticShotgun.label: shotgun blast
LanguageData.ARL_Bullet_ShotgunHandgun.label: shotgun handgun blast
LanguageData.ARL_BullpupRifle.label: bullpup rifle
LanguageData.ARL_BullpupRifle.description: The VK-47 Flatline is an anti-personnel fully automatic bullpup assault rifle. It has negligible vertical recoil, instead involving an extreme degree of horizontal recoil, similar to the Alternator light SMG.
LanguageData.ARL_BullpupRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.ARL_BullpupRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.ARL_BullpupRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: bullpup rifle
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeLMG.label: charge LMG
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeLMG.description: The X-55 Devotion is a charge LMG capable of firing armour piercing projectiles at insane speed with almost no need to reload. The further away the target, the more accurate Devotion gets.
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeLMG.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeLMG.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeLMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: charge LMG
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeMinigun.label: charge minigun
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeMinigun.description: The 40mm Charge Minigun (Or "40 mil") is a multi-purpose/ anti-vehicle automatic cannon. It is a popular and versatile armament often fielded by glitterworld soldiers operating in medium to long-distance engagements. The 40mm cartridge can be lethal to both enemy personnel and vehicles due to explosive shells.
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeMinigun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeMinigun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeMinigun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: charge minigun
LanguageData.ARL_ChargePistol.label: charge pistol
LanguageData.ARL_ChargePistol.description: The RE-45 is a fully automatic charge pistol, sacrificing damage and accuracy at longer distances for improved effectiveness at close range.
LanguageData.ARL_ChargePistol.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.ARL_ChargePistol.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.ARL_ChargePistol.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: charge pistol
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeShotgun.label: charge shotgun
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeShotgun.description: Intended for low-zero gravity ship boarding and clearing operations, the Mastiff gained notoriety throughout The Rimworlds as a reliable and devastating combat shotgun.
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeShotgun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeShotgun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeShotgun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: charge shotgun
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeSMG.label: charge SMG
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeSMG.description: The Prowler Burst PDW is 3 round fast burst firing anti-personnel charge personal defense weapon (PDW). Lethal in close quarters, Prowler is known for terrible accuracy long range.
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeSMG.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeSMG.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeSMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: charge SMG
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeSniperRifle.label: charge sniper rifle
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeSniperRifle.description: The Triple Take is a triple-barrel marksman rifle that consumes 3 bullets per shot. The shots are fired side by side, and the default sights have two chevrons, indicating where the shots will land.
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeSniperRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.ARL_ChargeSniperRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.ARL_CombatHandgun.label: combat handgun
LanguageData.ARL_CombatHandgun.description: The Hammond P2020 is a semi-automatic handgun with good accuracy and damage at range. Its integrated 'match trigger' allows it to be fired very rapidly, which is useful in close quarters.
LanguageData.ARL_CombatHandgun.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.ARL_CombatHandgun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.ARL_CombatHandgun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: combat handgun
LanguageData.ARL_CompactSMG.label: compact SMG
LanguageData.ARL_CompactSMG.description: The R-99 is a compact submachine gun that excels at close-quarters combat, due to its extremely high rate of fire and minimal recoil.
LanguageData.ARL_CompactSMG.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.ARL_CompactSMG.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.ARL_CompactSMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: compact SMG
LanguageData.ARL_GrenadeLauncher.label: grenade launcher
LanguageData.ARL_GrenadeLauncher.description: The R-6P Softball Anti-Armor Grenade Launcher (AAGL) is a rotary magazine grenade launcher. It is lightweight and stowable, which allows its operator to quickly fire and maneuver.
LanguageData.ARL_GrenadeLauncher.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.ARL_GrenadeLauncher.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.ARL_HandCannon.label: hand cannon
LanguageData.ARL_HandCannon.description: The B3 Wingman is an extremely powerful revolver with very high accuracy out to long ranges. Precision aim is required to mitigate the disadvantages of its very low rate of fire.
LanguageData.ARL_HandCannon.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.ARL_HandCannon.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.ARL_HandCannon.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: hand cannon
LanguageData.ARL_HMG.label: HMG
LanguageData.ARL_HMG.description: The Spitfire Heavy Machine Gun recoils heavily when first fired, but quickly settles into a tight firing pattern. The manufacturer strongly recommends sustained saturating fire, instead of short controlled bursts.
LanguageData.ARL_HMG.tools.barrels.label: barrels
LanguageData.ARL_HMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: HMG
LanguageData.ARL_LeverActionShotgun.label: lever-action shotgun
LanguageData.ARL_LeverActionShotgun.description: The Peacekeeper is an anti-personnel lever-action shotgun, with rail-operated barrel firing mechanism. Despite not possessing a stopping power of a pump action shotgun, Peacekeeper reload time is much faster.
LanguageData.ARL_LeverActionShotgun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.ARL_LightSMG.label: light SMG
LanguageData.ARL_LightSMG.description: Twin Barrel SMG with the clip twice the size of a machine pistol. Lethal in close quarters.
LanguageData.ARL_LightSMG.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.ARL_LightSMG.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.ARL_LightSMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: light SMG
LanguageData.ARL_MarksmanRifle.label: marksman rifle
LanguageData.ARL_MarksmanRifle.description: The Longbow-DMR is a semi-automatic sniper rifle. Its hyper-velocity round completely eliminates the need to lead targets, and allows the shooter to fire multiple shots quickly in succession.
LanguageData.ARL_MarksmanRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.ARL_MarksmanRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.ARL_MarksmanRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: marksman rifle
LanguageData.ARL_MechanoidLMG.label: mechanoid LMG
LanguageData.ARL_MechanoidLMG.description: The L-STAR is a rapid fire particle accelerating charge light machine gun. It fires energy bolts at a moderate speed at the target. Perfect for area suppresion, this weapon uses salvaged mechanoid technology.
LanguageData.ARL_MechanoidLMG.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.ARL_MechanoidLMG.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.ARL_MechanoidLMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: mechanoid LMG
LanguageData.ARL_MechanoidRifle.label: mechanoid rifle
LanguageData.ARL_MechanoidRifle.description: The Havoc Rifle fires two energy beam bursts that inflicts massive damage. Holding the trigger charges the weapon. Timing is critical to its use: this weapon will only fire when it reaches full charge and reloading takes a little while.
LanguageData.ARL_MechanoidRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.ARL_MechanoidRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.ARL_MechanoidRocketLauncher.label: mechanoid inferno launcher
LanguageData.ARL_MechanoidRocketLauncher.description: The Mechanoid Rocket launcher fires eight small rockets at once in its primary firing mode that are effective at temporarily denying territory to the enemy.
LanguageData.ARL_MechanoidSniperRifle.label: mechanoid sniper rifle
LanguageData.ARL_MechanoidSniperRifle.description: The Kraber fires a unique round that ensures 'one-shot,one-kill' results against human-scale targets. However, considerable judgement in leading is required, making this a difficult weapon to use against moving targets.
LanguageData.ARL_SemiautomaticRifle.label: semi-automatic rifle
LanguageData.ARL_SemiautomaticRifle.description: Despite recent advances in weapons technology, the older G7 Scout semi-automatic rifle remains a favorite of special forces units due to damage and extremely precise fire - a testament to its high level of craftsmanship.
LanguageData.ARL_SemiautomaticRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.ARL_SemiAutomaticShotgun.label: semi-automatic shotgun
LanguageData.ARL_SemiAutomaticShotgun.description: The EVA-8 is a semi-automatic shotgun, originally designed for extra-vehicular activity, both in conventional and in exo-atmospheric conditions.
LanguageData.ARL_ShotgunHandgun.label: shotgun handgun
LanguageData.ARL_ShotgunHandgun.description: Controlled spread triple barrel shotgun pistol.
LanguageData.ARL_ShotgunHandgun.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.ARL_ShotgunHandgun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
